name: Into the Gate
description:
Navigate your way around the small forest shrine. Find the clues hidden around the area, and harness the power of all four seasons to make your way back home.

WASD + Mouse to Move
E to Interact
Esc to Pause

Credits:
Bag and Button SFX - Tao & Sound
Footstep SFX - Estudio Cafofo
Background Music - Steven Melin
